name: JP (@byjp@hachyderm.io)
summary:
@www.jvt.me@www.jvt.me hey man! I was reading your old post on the books mf2 service you built; would you be interested in partnering on a PR to the open library repo to add the relevant classes directly to their site?

I think they’d be up for change if we highlighted the value and were professional enough about our tests etc; and I’d love to learn more from you about mf2! ☺️
